message.body:
>>9cc24da02a
> Why not make a 0anime?
Moar 0chans to the 0chan god! I'm wondering why we need 0porn at all. Why not just create /porn/ and /hentai/ and probably separate /loli/ on regular 0chan. ZeroNet is nearly empty and you people create separate imageboard for every fucking topic lol are you mad.

>>2ad09a730a
If 0chan owner will shut it down, anyone can get it back and share new link. That's the whole point of ZeroNet.
